name: Business in the Community Ireland
goal:
To harness the power of Irish business to maximise its positive impact on all its stakeholders and society.
Key areas - CSR, sustainability, social inclusion in Education and Employment
interests: Climate Action, Communication, Economic and Financial Affairs, Education, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Enterprise, Information Society, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Youth
euInitiatives:
Corporate Social Responsibility
Employment supports for disadvantaged people, migrants, youth
Education supports
we are a member of CSR Europe, a EU wide network dedicated to CSR. We represent Ireland
